title: Customer Research - ICP

sheets.title: Segmentation Matrix (RFM)
sheets.note: Template - count/percentage columns empty pending launch data

changes: Merged 'Deep Psychographic Profiles' and 'Deep Psychographic Profiles 2' into single 'psychographic_profiles' file
ICP Analysis sheet content merged into this _meta.json as analysis_summary below

archetype_validation.rationale: Strong VOC support from LMNT reviews and Reddit keto communities. 7+ direct quotes validate pain points. Electrolyte need is well-established in keto literature.
Good behavioral alignment but less VOC depth. Cramp complaints validated through fitness forums. Instagrammable desire inferred, not directly quoted.
Strongest alignment with primary ICP. Research-obsessive behavior well-documented. Huberman/Attia listener overlap validated.
Fasting electrolyte need is real but VOC gaps remain. Limited direct quotes. Need dedicated fasting community research.
Unvalidated. Logical persona but no direct VOC support. Risk of projection. Needs interview validation.

jtbd_market_jobs.job: Eliminate keto flu symptoms so I can stay in ketosis without suffering
Prevent cramps during intense training so I can perform at my best
Optimize my mineral intake with the cleanest possible source so I know I'm not putting garbage in my body
Feel good during my fasting window without breaking my fast
Stay hydrated for weekend activities without becoming a supplement person

strategic_implications: Primary ICP (Biohacker Ben profile) is best validated and highest LTV potential
Keto/Carnivore segment has strongest VOC foundation - best for launch messaging
Female Wellness (Fasting Fiona) represents expansion opportunity but needs dedicated research before targeting
Weekend Warrior: insufficient data — defer until post-launch (persona dialogue softened from 'deprioritize or drop')
Job 3 (Daily Wellness/Energy) is most promising hypothesis to test first (downgraded from 'strongest opening' by persona dialogue)
Launch sequence should be: Biohacker/Keto first, then Athletic, then Fasting, then General
TENSION: Strongest strategic segment (Daily Wellness) may have lowest WTP — cross-ref 06_Unit_Economics

intelligence_gaps.action: Validate or kill via Reddit/interview research
ICP-2026-02-04-001: 8 rounds, 4 UPGRADED, 4 RESOLVED. Grade B- → B

intelligence_gaps.gap: Positioning-economics tension: strongest strategic segment may have lowest WTP
intelligence_gaps.action: Unit economics modeling by segment — cross-ref 06_Unit_Economics
Include WTP question in all customer interviews

key_blockers: Female Wellness + Fasting VOC gaps remain; Weekend Warrior deferred; positioning-economics tension unresolved
next_action: Research Female Wellness ICP (3-4 hrs); collect fasting-specific VOC (2-3 hrs); model unit economics by segment
